abstractContent.text: UK Abstract We describe a computational system which parses discourses consisting of sequences of simple sentences.

entities.text: parses discourses consisting of sequences of simple sentences

abstractContent.text: These contain a range of temporal constructions, including time adverbials, progressive aspect and various aspectual classes.
In particular, the grammar generates the required readings, according to the theoretical analysis of (Glasbey, forthcoming), for sentence-final 'then'.
